text: Yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 4. Should any bhikkhunī, having had one thing requested, (then send it back and) have another thing requested, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
